item.content:encoded:
Price: $79.47
(as of Nov 29,2022 05:28:45 UTC – Details)


Look no further than this colorblock parka to keep you warm on cold practice days or in between swim events. Cozy fleece lining and a water-resistant shell make this lightweight, packable style the only outerwear you need. Highlights Cozy fleece lining Water-resistant outer layer Lightweight design 2-way zipper (inside & out) Hooded Outer: 100% Polyester Inner: 100% Polyester Fleece.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 16 x 15 x 6 inches; 2 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ USXTEAMPARKAA
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 3, 2015
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Speedo Swimwear
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B00YT3JCS0

Imported
Zipper closure
Hand Wash Only
COZY FLEECE: Soft inner fleece lining for extra warmth and faster drying time
WATER-RESISTANT: Outer layer resists water and moisture
LIGHTWEIGHT: Easily roll up and take with you anywhere

YOUR TEAM YOUR COLORS

From diving pairs to racing teams, Speedo team apparel can help you look like a cohesive unit. Show up to competitions with matching or coordinating team swimwear and apparel and you'll look and feel ready to show the other teams who's boss.

Fleece Lined

Fleece lined for extra warmth for those cold morning practices.

Zipper

Two-way zipper on parkas allows one to move more freely. Highest quality zippers are used.

Pockets

Convenient pockets on the front.

Draw String

Easily adjusted for the perfect fit.

With a wide variety of colors, patterns and styles available, you can outfit the whole team to match your team or school.

What the team wears headed onto deck and pool is an important choice, find the perfect color and pattern to represent everyone.

    Find your perfect fit from top to bottom.

  2. Men's Size Chart

    Offering an extended range to get you the perfect fit.
